document.full_text: former gov. rod r. blagojevich ended the most important campaign of his life tuesday, stepping down from the witness stand at his corruption retrial after speaking for seven days.
document.title: midwest: illinois: blagojevich leaves the stand
lines_and_colors: former gov. rod r. blagojevich ended the most important campaign of his life tuesday, stepping down from the witness stand at his corruption retrial after speaking for seven days.
